bug.author: sshuair
bug.description:
OS: MacOS 10.14.3 kubeflow: V0.5.0 kubernets: V1.13.0
I have success created a notebook server <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5787131/57118700-b6732700-6d97-11e9-8293-d9d925ac9d24.png></denchmark-link>
but when I connect to the notebook, it show the errors: <denchmark-code>Jupyter Notebook 404 : Not Found You are requesting a page that does not exist! </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5787131/57118727-ddc9f400-6d97-11e9-9bc9-c4caf4f5fb21.png></denchmark-link>
